page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT NETBALL LUTON
page.content: Every Tuesday at 6.30pm I leave my house for netball and go down to Old Bedford Rd. to the Recreation Centre. We have a game of netball for an hour. I play either GA or GD (goal attack or goal defence). After a game of netball we play around and play other games to help us get better at netball. We have matches on Thursdays, we have a match next week but I won't be there because I am going on holiday. We will carry on playing netball through the holidays right through until the winter. We are called the 'Farley Fliers' and when we win a match we are on Chiltern Radio because the transport managers husband works there, and we might be in the Herald newspaper.
